descriptions.mouse: Pays 1 coin per turn. Can be consumed by "Cat" for a +20 bonus and permanent removal from the deck.
descriptions.milk: Pays 1 coin per turn. Can be consumed by "Cat" for a +20 bonus and permanent removal from the deck.
descriptions.rock: Pays 0 coins per turn. Can be mined and removed from the deck by an adjacent "Miner".
descriptions.seed: Pays 0 coins per turn. Bonus +3 base value if adjacent to "Sun" or "Rain".
descriptions.carrot: Pays 1 coin per turn. Can be consumed by an adjacent "Rabbit" for a +8 bonus and permanent removal from the deck.
descriptions.rabbit: Consumes adjacent "Carrot", giving a +8 bonus for the turn and permanently removing the Carrot from the deck.
descriptions.apple: Pays 1 coin per turn. Has "fruit" tag; can be consumed by "Monkey" for 6x value bonus.
descriptions.bee: Pays 1 coin per turn. Bonus +1 value for each adjacent "Blossom" or plant-tagged symbol.
descriptions.blossom: Pays 1 coin per turn. Has "plant" tag.
descriptions.rain: Pays 1 coin per turn. Adds +1 value to all adjacent symbols with "plant" tag.
descriptions.dog: Pays 2 coins per turn. Adds +2 value to all adjacent symbols with "human" tag.
descriptions.key: Consumes/Opens adjacent "Lockbox" or "Safe". Provides +20 for Lockbox and +50 for Safe.
descriptions.monkey: Consumes all adjacent symbols with the "fruit" tag (excluding itself). Provides 6x the base value of the consumed symbol as bonus revenue.
descriptions.banana: Pays 1 coin per turn. Has "fruit" tag.
descriptions.lockbox: Pays 1 coin per turn. Provides a +20 bonus when opened by an adjacent "Key".
descriptions.beer: Pays 1 coin per turn. Has "food" tag.
descriptions.farmer: Pays 2 coins per turn. Adds +2 value to all adjacent symbols with "plant" tag.
descriptions.mushroom: Pays 2 coins per turn. Total value is multiplied by 3x if adjacent to "Rain".
descriptions.fish: Pays 2 coins per turn. Bonus +3 to base value if adjacent to "Water".
descriptions.water: Pays 1 coin per turn. Adds +1 value to adjacent "Plants" and +3 value to adjacent "Fish".
descriptions.fire: Consumes adjacent "Tree", giving 5x the base value of the consumed tree as bonus revenue.
descriptions.tree: Pays 3 coins per turn. Has "plant" tag.
descriptions.cat: Consumes adjacent "Mouse" or "Milk", giving a +20 bonus and permanently removing them from the deck.
descriptions.sun: Pays 2 coins per turn. Multiplies the total value of all adjacent symbols with the "plant" tag by 2x.
descriptions.miner: Consumes adjacent symbols with the "mineral" tag (e.g., Rock or Diamond). Gives 10x the base value of the consumed symbol as bonus revenue.
descriptions.diamond: Pays 5 coins per turn. Has "mineral" tag.
descriptions.safe: Pays 1 coin per turn. Provides a +50 bonus when opened by an adjacent "Key".
descriptions.chef: Pays 2 coins per turn. Adds +2 value to all adjacent symbols with the "food" tag.
descriptions.fox: Consumes adjacent "Rabbit", giving 8x the base value of the consumed rabbit as bonus revenue.
descriptions.moon: Pays 3 coins per turn. Adds +2 to the base value of all adjacent symbols.
descriptions.lightning: Consumes adjacent "Tree". In addition to the consumption bonus, triggers an area effect adding +5 value to all adjacent symbols.
descriptions.vase: Pays 5 coins per turn. Shatters and gives 0 value if adjacent to "Fire" or "Lightning".
descriptions.fisherman: Consumes adjacent "Fish", giving 6x the base value of the consumed fish as bonus revenue.
descriptions.wizard: Pays 4 coins per turn. Randomly adds the base value of one adjacent symbol to its own total for the turn.
descriptions.joker: Pays 3 coins per turn. Multiplies the total value of all adjacent symbols by 2x.
descriptions.king: Pays 2 coins per turn. Multiplies the total value of all adjacent symbols with the "human" tag by 2x.
descriptions.dragon: Pays 3 coins per turn. Representing the symbol of power.
descriptions.rainbow: Pays 5 coins per turn. Adds +3 to the base value for each unique tag type present on the board.
descriptions.slotmachine: Base value 0. Pays a random amount between 0 and 50 coins each turn.
descriptions.genie: Pays 10 coins per turn. Multiplies the total value of all adjacent symbols by 2x.
